extendedInfo.description: âThis app has ALL the restaurants I go to and since I started using it I have lost 20 lbs using this app!â - Sarah Hook âââââThis is the LITE Version! ONLY FIRST THREE RESTAURANTS WORK IN LITE VERSION.It is designed for people who want to try out lite version before spend money for full version.Most of the apps don't give you this opportunity. The ONLY Restaurant app for iPhone AND Android with over 250 restaurants, fast search, favorites list, and constantly updated menus to help you watch and lose weight!! It has food score values for classic & new systems as well as calories, carbs, protein, fat and sodium values!!!!So you are trying to lose a few pounds and it's going good... BUT it's soooo hard to track when you EAT OUT at restaurants!!! It is so frustrating when you don't know the food score values of the restaurant foods you are eating!! If you are a calorie watcher you will know what I mean!!If you don't track the restaurant foods properly you could RISK all of your hard work and unknowingly gain all those pounds and weight back!! This is the last thing you want if you are trying to lose weight!!!BUT wait... you have your phone with you 96% of the time (except the shower... at least I hope :p) So that means that you have a HUGE database of restaurant food score values with you wherever you GO!! That's exactly what this Restaurant guide app does for you! It gives you all of the restaurant food score values, calories, carbs, protein, and fat scores for ALL of the foods on the menu! This is something everyone watching their weight should have if they want to reach their weight loss goals!Purchase this Restaurant guide app now to ensure your weight loss success and enjoy a long, healthy, and happy life!P.S. This app is on Sale for $3.99 LIMITED TIME ONLY! Regular price $6.99! Get this app now so that your weight decreases and you get the body that want!!!P.P.S Get this app now so that you don't fall off the wagon and jeopardize your weight loss! â Has the LARGEST and MOST UP TO DATE selection of restaurants!â The ONLY Restaurant app with a Favorites List!â The ONLY Restaurant app with a Fast Search!â Lose the belly and get the flat stomach you have always wanted!â Over 250 Restaurants included for your weight loss needs! â Use this app also to know the food score/calories you will consume and what to order. â This app shows you the healthy restaurant foods, plus it gives you the ability to search.â Provides you with food score values(classic and new), calories, carbs, fat, protein of food items of most popular restaurants and fast food chains and growing! â Screen is re-sizable. You can make it smaller or larger using the points of your fingertips. â Check out the screen shots & see for yourself! âââââ - "Great app for anyone trying to lose weight. reviews.title: Free version too limited
reviews.comment: When it says only the first 3 restaurants are avail on the free version it means the first 3 in their database, (currently 7-11, 5 guys, and 54th st).  It has potential, but reel me in first with 3 usable options
reviews.author: A Google User
